name: faceit-lobby-extension
description: Extension for Faceit (CS:GO) which reveals additional info about the opponents in the match lobby.

scripts.build: parcel build src/js/main.js -d extension/js/ -o main.js && parcel build src/js/popup.js -d extension/js/ -o popup.js  && parcel build src/js/background.js -d extension/js/ -o background.js && gulp copy-src

author: przbetkier
